short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A helper to decode text encodings such as base64 or UNIX timestamps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A helper to decode text encodings such as base64 or UNIX timestamps.  This extension is helpful for software developers who need to decode text from logs or error reports.  The extension allows you to decode these items in the browser rather than having to copy text and paste to a command line tool for analysis.
